bibl.title: Labelling Wisdom: What Makes the Sentences of Demotic and Greek Wisdom Texts Proverbs and What not? Avec résumés en français et en anglais.
bibl.note: To what extent can we use labels such as proverb or maxim to refer to the ancient wisdom material in Greek and in Demotic and to which features of the material are such labels and their definitions linked? - A. Labelling Demotic and Greek Wisdom. - B. Labels and Internal Features. - C. Labels and External Features.

bibl.title: Actes du IXe congrès international des études démotiques. Paris, 31 août - 3 septembre 2005

bibl.seg: LAZARIDIS Nikolaos, Labelling Wisdom: What Makes the Sentences of Demotic and Greek Wisdom Texts Proverbs and What not? Avec résumés en français et en anglais.
Ghislaine WIDMER et Didier DEVAUCHELLE (Édd.), Actes du IXe congrès international des études démotiques. Paris, 31 août - 3 septembre 2005 = Bibliothèque d'étude. 147 (Le Caire, 2009) pp. 157-171.

To what extent can we use labels such as proverb or maxim to refer to the ancient wisdom material in Greek and in Demotic and to which features of the material are such labels and their definitions linked? - A. Labelling Demotic and Greek Wisdom. - B. Labels and Internal Features. - C. Labels and External Features.
